item.description: You are invited to North Shores newest "Singles" Dine and Dance event Tuesday Nights at Bangkok Paradise Restaurant in Salem, Mass. Web site bangkokparadise.com Join us for an evening of fine Thai Cuisine and Social Dancing. Casual dress and jeans are Ok. Dinner and Dancing starting at at 7 pm or at your leisure. Dance throughout the evening to Salsa, Hustle, Cha Cha,Swing, Club Mix, Oldies and more. Come and experience our great group of Singles from the North Shore. Hope to see at our next Meet Up event, D J Dancin, Organizer
item.name: North Shore "Singles" Dine and Dance Meet Up
